titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain pigments.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1741-1742)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/23/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duties on various specified red and yellow pigments.
